Always Ready.name: Always Ready
Always Ready.description: You are methodical in your preparations and make sure to secure your surroundings. You get a +2 bonus on initiative checks and may draw a weapon as a free action at the start of your first turn if one is within reach or ready on your person.

Grim Determination.name: Grim Determination
Grim Determination.description: You saw the worst of the Fall and it takes a lot to shake your nerve. Increase your Will save by 1 step. If you are ever @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Confused]{Confused}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fleeing]{Fleeing}, you get a new saving throw at the end of each of your turns to end the effect (if a saving throw is allowed).

Haggle.name: Haggle
Haggle.description: Whenever you are trading for equipment, you can attempt a Diplomacy or Deception skill check against the trader's Will DC. If you succeed, treat one item you are offering up for barter as if it was worth 1 barter more. If you critically succeed, treat it as if it was worth 2 barter more. If you critically fail, the trader refuses to do business with you. You can only do this once per day with an individual trader.

Hope Springs Eternal.name: Hope Springs Eternal
Hope Springs Eternal.description: You start each session with 1 extra Hope, but if you do not spend at least 1 hope in that session, it is lost. Also, there is no limit to the amount of hope that you can have at any one time.

Innoculated.name: Innoculated
Innoculated.description: While in Stage 1 of Z Plague infection infection, whenever you roll a Fortitude save, you may roll twice and take the better result.

Mental Map.name: Mental Map
Mental Map.description: Whenever you attempt a Driving check to navigate or Survival check to avoid getting lost or to find the safest route, you treat a failure as a success and a critical failure as just a failure. In addition, if you attempt a Perception check to avoid being surprised in a familiar area (somewhere you have been able to freely explore for 1 day or more), you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.

Never Tired.name: Never Tired
Never Tired.description: You do not get @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued} from bruises and you are not fatigued as long as you get 4 hours of sleep. In addition, you can carry 3 extra bulk worth of items (although this does not let you carry more items than will fit on your inventory sheet).

Scheduling Master.name: Scheduling Master
Scheduling Master.description: Whenever you are performing a task that takes 10 minutes that only affects one target, like Repairing or First Aid, you can carefully budget your time to work on two targets instead. You can also use this ability to schedule someone else's time, granting them the same benefit, but you must spend that time directing them, to ensure they work efficiently.

Survivor.name: Survivor
Survivor.description: Hopefinder is a game played without a class proper. This class item will set up some basic automation for Hopefinder on actors for you.

1.text: Critical hits from bludgeoning weapons also deal 1 @UUID[Compendium.hopefinder.effects.Item.KNcK8MtYgm6ka7PO]{Bruise}.

2.text: Critical hits from acid attacks cause [[/r 1[persistent,acid]]]{1} damage.

3.text: Critical hits from acid attacks cause [[/r 1[persistent,fire]]]{1} damage.

4.text: Critical hits from cold attacks cause the target to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

5.text: Critical hits from electricity attacks cause the target to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

6.text: Critical hits from piercing weapons cause the target to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1} until the target receives any amount of healing.

7.text: Critical hits from slashing weapons cause the target to take [[/r 1[persistent,bleed]]]{1} damage.

8.text: Critical hits from poison attacks cause the target to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 hour.

9.text: Critical hits from sonic attacks cause the target to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} for 1 hour.

10.text: Critical damage from this weapon is triple instead of double.

18.prompt: Select an ability score to increase

19.prompt: Select a second ability score to increase

23.prompt: Select a third ability score to increase

24.prompt: Select an ability score to decrease

27.prompt: Select a save to be expert in

29.prompt: Select an ability score to increase

Tireless Energy.name: Tireless Energy
Tireless Energy.description: You are energetic. Increase your speed by 5 feet. If you succeed at a check to climb or swim, increase the distance traveled by 5 feet. Finally, you heal 1 additional bruise whenever you rest.

1.text: If you succeed at a check to climb or swim, increase the distance traveled by 5 feet.

Triage.name: Triage
Triage.description: You can perform First Aid or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Treat Wounds]{Treat Wounds} on up to 6 people in 20 minutes. When you successfully Treat Wounds, you heal an additional amount of Hit Points equal to your level.

Zone Out.name: Zone Out
Zone Out.description: You can easily get lost in a simple task, allowing you to focus on the smallest details. You get a +2 circumstance bonus on any check related to an exploration activity and on initiative checks.
